Cash Out.definition: to prematurely redeem the securities of
Cash Out.origin: [the merging company will cash out the minority shareholders]

1.definition: to prematurely redeem the securities of (a holder) often as part of a merger [the merging company willthe minority shareholders]

2 a.definition: to accept payment for (a security) in full often unwillingly [the shareholders were required totheir shares]

sub_terms.b: to dispose of (one's goods or assets) by sale [his investment]
